page.title: 10RECREATION IN GRIMSARGH
page.content: The whole idea of the village hall started in the 1920's. For the project the villagers raised fifty thousand pounds. It took ten years to raise the money. It took six months to build and was opened on 8th October 1983. It has a kitchen and a bar and a hall which is big enough to take a badmington court. The big hall seats 200 people and the small hall 50 people. The village hall is used a lot. The Community Association looks after it mainly. This is its time table: Monday: Top class, ballet, keep fit, sequence dancing, lunch club. Tuesday: play group, youth club, sewing classes. Wednesaday: Mother & Toddler, W.I., Badmington, ballet, gardening club. Thursday: playgroup, sewing classes, Badington, Parich C. Meeting. Friday: Weddings, Birthday parties. Saturday: Ballet, Dancing, Birthday parties.
